name: Doom Trooper
description:
Doom Trooper is an out-of-print collectible card game designed by Bryan Winter and was released in January 1995. It is based on concepts from the Mutant Chronicles franchise. Players use warriors to attack and gain either Promotion Points or Destiny Points. Promotion points can be used to win; Destiny Points are used to purchase more warriors and equipment. There are 13 different card types and over 1100 different cards available.

Doom Trooper was originally published by now defunct Target Games.
